QAPair.Question: What is (are) Domestic violence ?
QAPair.Answer: Domestic violence is when a person uses abusive behavior to control a partner or other family member. The abuse can be physical, emotional, economic, or sexual. It can affect people of any age, sex, culture, or class. When domestic violence is aimed at a child, it is called child abuse . Domestic violence is a crime.
